spell_tooltip.description: Thunder Focus Tea provides immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Revival's cooldown is reduced by 16%, and provides immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 2 sec.
Demateralize into mist while stunned, reducing damage taken by 30%. Each second you remain stunned reduces this bonus by 10%.

Heals the target for 1.1 million over 6.5 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.1 million over 6.5 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 400,291 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 403,320 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 24,402 Nature damage or 100,291 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 470,472 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 337,758 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 254,171 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.4 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 133,591, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 83,106. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 82,862.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.5 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 169,081 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 84,559, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 154,713 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.1 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 146,924 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 87,985 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 182,877 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 25,415, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing. Vitality stored from overhealing is reduced.

For 10 sec after casting Thunder Focus Tea your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional healing over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm also withdraw vitality to damage enemies for an additional 20% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 158,590 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 96,819 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.

Heals the target for 1.1 million over 6.5 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.1 million over 6.5 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 405,657 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 394,434 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds

Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 24,498 Nature damage or 97,938 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.

Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.

Vivify has a 20% chance to cause your next Rising Sun Kick or Enveloping Mist to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Enveloping Mist and Rising Sun Kick have a 20% chance to cause your next Vivify to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 168,776 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.1 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 88,742 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 176,710 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.

Renewing Mist now has 3 charges and reduces the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick by 1.0 sec.

Rising Sun Kick now reduces the remaining cooldown of Renewing Mist by 1.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 25,209, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Teachings of the Monastery has a 15% chance to refund a charge when consumed. 

The damage of Tiger Palm is increased by 10%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 297,412 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Refreshing Jade Wind while Chi-Ji, the Red Crane or Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent is active.
Sheilun's Gift calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for up to 8 sec, based on the clouds of mist consumed.
After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 3% of your maximum health.
Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for 132,158.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.
Casting Jadefire Stomp increases the damage or healing of your next Rising Sun Kick by 30% or Vivify by 50%.

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

You consume a healing elixir when you drop below 40% health or generate excess healing elixirs, instantly healing you for 15% of your maximum health.

You generate 1 healing elixir every 30 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
Life Cocoon grants up to 5 stacks of Mana Tea and applies 2 stacks of Healing Elixir to its target.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.
Your Enveloping Mists heal the target for 1.2% of their maximum health each time they take direct damage.

Summons an effigy of Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent for 12 sec. Yu'lon will heal injured allies with Soothing Breath, healing the target and up to 2 allies for 111,043 over 3.7 sec. 

Enveloping Mist costs 50% less mana while Yu'lon is active.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Soothing Mist now follows the target of your Enveloping Mist or Vivify and its channel time is increased by 4 sec.

You gain 20% haste for 8 sec after summoning your Celestial.

Casting Vivify or Enveloping Mist on a target with Renewing Mist has a 10% chance to spread the Renewing Mist to another target.

Your Vivify healing through Renewing Mist is increased by 10% and your Enveloping Mist also heals allies with Renewing Mist for 12% of its healing.
The healing of Enveloping Mist and Vivify is increased by 6%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 297,412 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 399,250 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 24,152 Nature damage or 97,321 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 470,472 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 322,722 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 254,171 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.4 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 132,768, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 85,039. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 83,475.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.6 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 170,411 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 84,586, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 154,713 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.1 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 146,924 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 86,978 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 184,097 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 24,743, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm also withdraw vitality to damage enemies for an additional 20% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 158,590 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 96,819 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Fists of Fury now reduces all targets movement speed by 90%, and you Parry all attacks while channelling Fists of Fury.
Killing a player with Touch of Death reduces the remaining cooldown of Touch of Karma by 60 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 22,570 Nature damage to the enemy and 21,276 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 2% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 80% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 79,550 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 60% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.
When you Blackout Kick, your Stagger is reduced by 83,720.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 348,879.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 58,506 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.1 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 43,122 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 35,569 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew now has 2 charges.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
Keg Smash deals an additional 20% damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 12 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Abilities that grant Shuffle reduce the cooldown on Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox by 0.50 sec, and Niuzao's Stomp deals an additional 20% damage.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 1.0 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 69%. Additionally, Essence Font cooldown is reset instantly and heals up to 6 nearby allies for 43,265 health on channel start and end.
